actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act to further regulate oral prescriptions of certain controlled substances.
short_title: Prescription Drug Fraud Deterrence Act of 1992

summary.text: Prescription Drug Fraud Deterrence Act of 1992 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to direct the Attorney General to establish a system for the filling of prescriptions required by provisions relating to Schedules II through V, but allowed to be made orally.

titles.title: Prescription Drug Fraud Deterrence Act of 1992
To amend the Controlled Substances Act to further regulate oral prescriptions of certain controlled substances.
